sec.label: C.2.2
sec.title: Multiple power units
sec.p: Separate tramming engines on the rig shall not be in operation during the test.

When providing a power unit which is different from the engine of the carrier, this power unit shall be measured and declared separately. An exception is when the power unit is dedicated to a specific interchangeable equipment, in which case the measurement shall be carried out with the power unit in operation.
